author: Not available

text.0: Hit wæs geara iu      ðætte Gotan eastan
text.13: efne from Muntgiop      oð þone mæran wearoð
text.19: foron on ðæt fæsten;      fleah casere
text.20: mid þam æþelingum      ut on Grecas.
text.21: Ne meahte þa seo wealaf      wige forstandan
text.25: þeah wæs magorinca      mod mid Grecum,
text.27: Stod þrage on ðam.      þeod wæs gewunnen
text.29: þæt þe ðeodrice      þegnas and eorlas
text.33: Romwara bearn      and him recene to
text.34: friðes wilnedon.      He him fæste gehet
text.36: wyrðe gewunigen      on þære welegan byrig,
text.37: ðenden god wuolde      þæt he Gotena geweald
text.38: agan moste.      He þæt eall aleag.
text.42: heafde beheawon;      næs ðæt hærlic dæd.
text.43: Eac þam wæs unrim      oðres manes
text.44: þæt se Gota fremede      godra gehwilcum.
text.45: ða wæs ricra sum      on Rome byrig
text.48: þæt wæs rihtwis rinc,      næs mid Romwarum
text.50: He wæs for weorulde wis,      weorðmynða georn,
text.52: se hæle hatte      se þone hlisan geþah.
text.53: Wæs him on gemynde      mæla gehwilce
text.54: yfel and edwit      þæt him elðeodge
text.55: kyningas cyðdon.      Wæs on Greacas hold,
text.57: þe his eldran mid him      ahton longe,
text.58: lufan and lissa.      Angan þa listum ymbe
text.59: ðencean þearflice,      hu he ðider meahte
text.60: Crecas oncerran,      þæt se casere eft
text.63: degelice,      and hi for drihtne bæd
text.64: ealdum treowum,      ðæt hi æft to him
text.65: comen on þa ceastre,      lete Greca witan
text.67: lete þone leodscipe.      ða þa lare ongeat
text.68: ðeodric Amuling,      and þone þegn oferfeng,
text.7: þa wæs ofer Muntgiop      monig atyhted
text.70: healdon þone hererinc.      Wæs him hreoh sefa,
text.71: ege from ðam eorle.      He hine inne heht
text.75: wlencea under wolcnum;      he þy wyrs meahte
text.76: þolian þa þrage,      þa hio swa þearl becom.
text.77: Wæs þa ormod eorl,      are ne wende,
text.78: ne on þam fæstene      frofre gemunde,
text.79: ac he neowol astreaht      niðer of dune
text.80: feol on þa flore,      fela worda spræc,
text.81: forþoht ðearle;      ne wende þonan æfre
text.82: cuman of ðæm clammum.      Cleopode to drihtne

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
